James's place was simple and sweet - just what we needed for a quick one night stay. The room matched the listing and all the necessities were provided. Not everyone has the same preferences for beds but it's helpful to know that this one is very squeaky and bouncy, so it's not the best for couples if one is a light sleeper. Also, the AC is a window unit which makes some pretty wacky noises (as most do), and it's very close to the bed, so be aware of that if you're sensitive to sounds while sleeping. When the unit is off, there is road noise, so you have to choose between the two. Another thing to point out is that this place is indeed very small. If you like to spread out and have some personal space away from your travel partner, this is not the place for you.
Bottom line, if I needed a place to stay for a few days or an extended duration, I personally would seek out a different place than James's. But for a single night, it was just dandy!
